trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the cardinality of an import is not compatible with the cardinality of the matching exports.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply".
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza la proprietà <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> della nuova istanza in un messaggio di sistema in cui viene descritto l'errore, ad esempio "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply".

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Questo messaggio prende in considerazione le impostazioni cultura correnti del sistema.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Proprietà

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valore

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`.

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: Stringa del messaggio di errore localizzato.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException" />, or <see langword="null" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> property to its default value.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException>.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Proprietà

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valore

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`.

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: Stringa del messaggio di errore specificata in `message`.

trans-unit.source: An object that holds the serialized object data about the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException" />.
An object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException" /> class with serialized data.
This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore viene chiamato durante la deserializzazione per ricostituire l'oggetto eccezione trasmesso su un flusso.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [serializzazione XML e SOAP](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="info" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="info" /> is missing a required value.
<paramref name="info" /> contains a value that cannot be cast to the correct type.
The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un'eccezione generata come risultato diretto di un'eccezione precedente deve includere un riferimento all'eccezione precedente nella proprietà <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> restituisce lo stesso valore passato al costruttore oppure `null` nel caso in cui la proprietà <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> non fornisca il valore di eccezione interna al costruttore.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException>.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException>.
